overview: This is the newest and 7th volume to the series “The Creepers Family”. Four more scenes of four more tales of the sexual creepy side of lesbian love. Lena Nicole is going to marry soon and wants to get the scoop of the family so she seduces Tara Morgan. Then Xandra Sixx is unable to pay her rent so Angela Sommers uses her body so she can pay off the debt. Mercedes Carrera yearns for a younger pussy and Allie Knox is her girl. Then Angela flirts with Mindi and they ravish each other bodies.
title: The Creepers Family 7
